parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Verify that access to classified information requiring special protection is granted only to individuals who:

parts.name: item
parts.prose: Have a valid access authorization that is demonstrated by assigned official government duties;

parts.name: item
parts.prose: Satisfy associated personnel security criteria; and

parts.name: item
parts.prose: Have read, understood, and signed a nondisclosure agreement.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Classified information that requires special protection includes collateral information, Special Access Program (SAP) information, and Sensitive Compartmented Information (SCI). Personnel security criteria reflect applicable laws, executive orders, directives, regulations, policies, standards, and guidelines.
